commit.message: Updated screenshot of the app for the documentation.
Added mouseInfo() to make the interface similar to how PyAutoGUI launches MouseInfo.
Updated setup.py to install the correct version of Pillow for the version of Python being run. (These will have to be updated as Pillow drops support for older version of Python (3.5, 3.6, 3.7)
Changed the setup.py so Pillow is only installed for Python versions that it supports. Modified MouseInfo so that it still runs even if Pillow is not installed.
Adding log and screenshot files to gitignore
Adding F1 through F8 labels to the buttons. Fixed setup.py so that it can be run from any folder.
Adding documentation.
Created a separate getPixel() function because on Windows the implementation for this is 7 times faster than the screenshot method.
Updating readme with doc link
Typo corrections.
Updating docs.
Adding documentation.
Added a menu with hotkeys for the Copy and Log buttons, and replaced the online documentation link with a menu item.
Renaming "Mouse Info" to "MouseInfo". Removing the Set and Reset XY Origin buttons so that just the text field exists.
Adding link to documentation.
Bump version number.
Added origin settings.
Added 3 second delay, and converted code to OOP style.
Added a message saying that the color part doesn't work on Mac right now (not until I figure out how to get screenshots without the mouse cursor).
Adding pyperclip as a dependency
Added better error messages for Linux, as well as replacing pymsgbox with a status bar.
Fixed several linux bugs that prevented Mouse Info from running there.
Adding a screenshot of the app for the docs.
Updated readme with usage info.
Decreased the window size by fixing the "tab over" text label.
Added some comments about why we don't have pyautogui as a dependency.
Removing the "get scale" functions, since those aren't needed. They were added as a potential fix for the screenshot bug.
Fixed the Log buttons for Python 2, since the Text widget doesn't have a replace() method on Python 2.
Added log and screenshot file saving feature.
Fixed the screenshot/getpixel bug on windows.
